title: tlačítka zavřít, minimalizovat, maximalizovat
content: V posledni versi Firefoxu, nevidím vpravo nahore tlačítka zavřít, minimalizovat, maximalizovat. Používám doplněk Classic Blue, který se mi líbí.
creator: pdena

title: Themes
content: Everytime I go to Gmail page, theme is always Black, I have it set to 'Random'
creator: 5togdoova21

title: Master Password
content: I would like the Master Password to be requested immediately when starting Firefox on Windows or Mac because it often happens that when I complete a search the Password entry box suddenly appears and it is really unpleasant because I never notice it immediately. I don't want to disable the Master Password, I just want it to be required immediately when Firefox starts. Unfortunately, I haven't found a setting to do this. Is there a way to solve this annoying problem? Thank you very much
creator: eugenio.tucci

title: History Clearing
content:
Greetings,

I have FF version 90.0.2 64bit when i go into settings to clear my history everything,the history still shows up on my address bar

Regards, Dabonz
creator: dabonz1965

title: Clearing Browser history and cookies for Windows 7 Home Premium
content:
I want to clear the Firefox browser history and cookies on my Windows 7 Home Premium computer. I am instructed to click the tools Icon then click History then select "Clear Recent History" for another menu. However I am unable to select "Clear Recent History" it is in light Grey and cannot be highlighted to be selected. What am I doing wrong? How do I clean up my browser history can remove any stored cookies?

Rick
creator: RIck54045

title: Even though I don't have it selected every time I open a new tab Firefox switches to it
content:
Good evening. I have Firefox set to NOT switch to a new tab when it opens from a link but it does anyway. I clicked the box and unclicked it but it still switches over. Any help would be appreciated.

Also, how can I stop the address bar from searching the web and just search bookmarks and history? I have a separate bar for searching and prefer my web searches show up there.

Thanks in advance.
creator: figureguy1

title: Error every time I try to edit my profile on the Mozilla support website
content: What the subject says. I'm getting the attached error every time I try to update my profile. Have tried several times in different browsers.
creator: c.rechner

title: Firefox does not respond to a search request
content: Firefox does not respond to a search request. After closing, a restart is answered by an error message - "Firefox is already running. The old Firefox process must be closed to open a new window." When this is done, another instance of Firefox displays. It appears that two instances of Firefox have opened when only one was requested and the second has somehow disabled the search request, either manual (direct) or from a separate application/link. I have completed a Refresh without any change in behaviour. What can I do now? Thank you Graham Garden
creator: grahamgarden

title: Firefox 一直無法結束,重新案裝後如何匯入舊的 Firefox 資料
content: Firefox 一直無法結束,怎修付都沒用,重新安裝也不行,但在桌面留有"舊的 Firefox 資料"的資料夾. 現在Firefox 已重新安裝OK,請問要怎麼匯入"舊的 Firefox 資料"
creator: darleh00

title: "Pause notifications until Firefox restarts" no longer visible or available in Firefox 90.0, what are some other possible options?
content:
I am trying to disable Firefox notifications whenever I take screenshots, and googling for solutions, I found the commonly suggested solution is to uncheck the "Pause notifications until Firefox restarts" box in Permissions:

[to turn off forever the "screenshot" splash notification]

[Copied" window]

This option is not available in my browser version; thus, I'm hoping there's a newer workaround for this.
creator: 0zen

title: Se produjo un fallo por motivos desconocidos al guardar la copia de seguridad del archivo PKCS #12.
content: Se produjo un fallo por motivos desconocidos al guardar la copia de seguridad del archivo PKCS #12.
creator: dejuzhanglin

title: The menus are short, with a scroll bar, in dual monitor setup
content:
I have just set up a second screen hooked up to my laptop, and the external monitor was set as my primary screen. But, I notice that whenever Firefox is on my in-built laptop (secondary) monitor, the firefox menu, as well as all the extension menus, are really short. The firefox menu at least has a scroll bar, but the others are unusable.

I tried disabling hardware acceleration (which, based on other questions, seems to fix certain other dual monitor weirdness around menus), but it did nothing. Any tips?

Thanks in advance.
creator: theo.bendit
